name: Burn out, Game out
description:
Have you ever wondered about how it feels to make a game? 

Well wonder no longer, in this game you create your own game by playing small but fun minigames. 

The completion of these minigames decide what the end result game looks, feels and sounds like.  (This is still in development so not implemented yet)

Try not to quit!

Controls:

Movement: WASD

Interacting: E
